description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Tiny Tim and his Tremendous Tank is an awesome physics based  action platform shooter that allows you to Destroy and Splatter  anything that moves.  This war just got messy!
